subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Zach Randolph had 26 points and 12 rebounds, and the visiting Memphis Grizzlies overcame a strong effort by Kevin Love to beat the Minnesota Timberwolves, 94-90.
snippet: Zach Randolph had 26 points and 12 rebounds, and the visiting Memphis Grizzlies overcame a strong effort by Kevin Love to beat the Minnesota Timberwolves, 94-90.
